## Basic statistics

*First analyses/output*

For our first output, we want to calculate the mean and SD for each
metabolite and then, to make it more readable, we want to round the
numbers to one digit. To do this, we will use the split-apply-combine
methodology and the across() function.

```{r basic-stats}
#' descriptive stats function
#'
#' @param data 
#'
#' @return A data.frame/tibble

descriptive_stats <- function(data) {
  lipidomics |>
    dplyr::group_by(metabolite) |>
    dplyr::summarise(across(value, list(mean = mean, sd = sd))) |>
    dplyr::mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, digits = 1)))
}

```
